column6:
The house is great for couples, University guests, visitors & business travelers. Located minutes away from Austin's best attractions, including the University of Texas, east & central Austin restaurants & downtown activities.
In a private setting, there are two open air patios to enjoy the breeze, greenery, views of UT, the Capitol, & Downtown.
Media room has a queen sleeper sofa.
Master bedroom has a separate work space/storage room. 
Downstairs living room has a 4k smart TV w/WIFI.
